About the Company: Dhanlaxmi Fabrics Ltd is a leading fabric & yarn processing company.The company`s product range includes fabrics like cotton, viscose, polyester, blended, lycra as pure white, reactive or vat dyed, pigment, reactive, prints, disperse or dischange print with finishes as required by customer and Yarn like Pure white, reactive or vat dyed cotton, rayon, polyester or blended yarn..The company also in the business activities of Power Generation, Textile Processing.
